Author: polyfractal
Content: unrelated: i rented a beefy'ish droplet to run the process flow. turns out despite being memory-short on my laptop, fewer/faster cores still win over more slower cores and lots of memory üôÅ

Author: polyfractal
Content: looks like quite a few steps are single-core operations. alas

Author: _luke_w_
Content: Yep, the fastest machine in my house for running this ASIC flow is my macbook air, annoyingly

Author: _luke_w_
Content: it's worse for some commercial ASIC tools because vendors will apply per-core licensing so the optimal play is to buy the fastest single-core machine you can find
